metas.name: Snatch
metas.description: Fast-paced British crime comedy with quirky characters and dark humor, similar to 'In Bruges' and 'Seven Psychopaths'.

metas.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
metas.description: Another Guy Ritchie classic, full of British wit, intricate plot twists, and criminal shenanigans, much like 'Snatch' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Pulp Fiction
metas.description: A quintessential crime film with dark humor, memorable characters, and non-linear storytelling, sharing similarities with 'In Bruges' and 'Seven Psychopaths'.

metas.name: Reservoir Dogs
metas.description: A tense and dialogue-heavy crime thriller with a touch of dark humor, reminiscent of 'Pulp Fiction' but on a smaller scale, appealing to fans of crime movies.

metas.name: Trainspotting
metas.description: A darkly comedic and visually striking film about heroin addicts in Scotland, blending humor and drama in a way that resonates with the tone of 'In Bruges'.

metas.name: The Big Lebowski
metas.description: A cult classic comedy with eccentric characters, a convoluted plot, and a laid-back vibe, aligning with the offbeat humor of 'Seven Psychopaths' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
metas.description: A dark satire about the Cold War with absurd humor and memorable performances, appealing to fans of war movies with a comedic twist like 'Three Kings'.

metas.name: MASH
metas.description: A black comedy set during the Korean War, known for its anti-establishment humor and irreverent portrayal of war, similar to the comedic elements in 'Three Kings'.

metas.name: War of the Worlds
metas.description: A thrilling and suspenseful science fiction film with intense action sequences, offering a blend of genres similar to '28 Days Later' and 'The Running Man'.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: A clever and action-packed sci-fi thriller with a time-loop premise, combining elements of action, humor, and suspense, appealing to fans of 'The Running Man' and 'Sonic the Hedgehog 3'.

metas.name: Shaun of the Dead
metas.description: A horror-comedy that cleverly blends zombie horror with British humor, resonating with the user's appreciation for both horror and comedy as seen in movies like '28 Days Later' and 'KPop Demon Hunters'.

metas.name: Zombieland
metas.description: A fun and fast-paced zombie comedy with quirky characters and creative zombie kills, similar to 'Shaun of the Dead' and aligning with the user's preference for horror-comedy movies.

metas.name: Tucker & Dale vs Evil
metas.description: A horror-comedy that subverts horror tropes with its hilarious premise and likable characters, providing a comedic take on horror similar to 'Shaun of the Dead'.

metas.name: Attack the Block
metas.description: A British sci-fi comedy about a gang of teenagers defending their neighborhood from aliens, blending action, humor, and social commentary, like KPop Demon Hunters and The Meteor Man.

metas.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
metas.description: A neo-noir black comedy crime film with witty dialogue, self-aware humor, and a complex plot, similar to 'Get Shorty' and 'Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery'.

metas.name: The Nice Guys
metas.description: A buddy cop action-comedy with great chemistry between the leads and a fun 70s setting, appealing to fans of 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: Brick
metas.description: A neo-noir mystery set in a high school, with stylized dialogue and a unique visual style, offering a twist on the mystery genre akin to 'Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery'.

metas.name: The Usual Suspects
metas.description: A classic crime thriller with a complex plot and a shocking twist ending, appealing to fans of suspenseful movies like 'The Shawshank Redemption'.

metas.name: Prisoners
metas.description: A dark and suspenseful thriller about a father's desperate search for his missing daughter, offering a gripping and intense viewing experience, similar to 'The Shawshank Redemption'.

metas.name: Gone Girl
metas.description: A psychological thriller with a twisty plot and compelling characters, providing a suspenseful and engaging experience, similar to 'Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery'.

metas.name: Lucky Number Slevin
metas.description: A crime thriller with witty dialogue, unexpected plot twists, and a quirky sense of humor, appealing to fans of 'Snatch' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: A Fish Called Wanda
metas.description: A classic British comedy with an ensemble cast and hilarious situations, fitting the comedic taste demonstrated in 'In Bruges' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: The World's End
metas.description: The final movie of the 'Cornetto Trilogy', blending science fiction with buddy comedy antics and a hint of British charm, similar to 'Shaun of the Dead' and 'Attack the Block'.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz
metas.description: Another great movie in the 'Cornetto Trilogy', blending British crime comedy with over-the-top action, resonating with the audience that loves 'In Bruges' and 'Three Kings'.

metas.name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
metas.description: A blend of live-action and animation with a mystery plot, comedy, and nods to classic film noir, similar to Night Is Short, Walk On Girl, but more accessible.

metas.name: The Fifth Element
metas.description: A visually stunning and quirky sci-fi action film with a unique sense of humor, appealing to fans of 'The Running Man' and 'Sonic the Hedgehog 3'.

metas.name: Akira
metas.description: A landmark animated film with stunning visuals and a gripping cyberpunk story, appealing to fans of action, thriller and science fiction.

metas.name: Paprika
metas.description: An animated psychological thriller with dreamlike visuals and a complex plot, similar to Night Is Short, Walk On Girl but for thriller fans.

metas.name: Millennium Actress
metas.description: A beautifully animated film about a legendary actress, blending romance, drama, and historical elements, similar to Night Is Short, Walk On Girl but more serious.

metas.name: Perfect Blue
metas.description: A suspenseful animated thriller about a pop star who is stalked and experiences a mental breakdown, appealing to fans of horror and thrillers.

metas.name: Elite Squad
metas.description: A gritty and intense Brazilian crime drama about a BOPE squad fighting drug traffickers in Rio de Janeiro, fitting the drama and crime categories.

metas.name: Bad Boys
metas.description: A buddy cop action-comedy with explosive action sequences and a lighthearted tone, appealing to fans of 'Ace Ventura: Pet Detective' and 'Three Kings'.

metas.name: Pain & Gain
metas.description: A dark comedy based on a true story about a group of bodybuilders who get involved in kidnapping and extortion, similar to 'In Bruges'.

metas.name: Fight Club
metas.description: A cult classic with dark humor, social commentary, and a shocking twist, appealing to fans of Seven Psychopaths.

metas.name: Burn After Reading
metas.description: A Coen brothers dark comedy with an ensemble cast and absurd plot, similar to the quirkiness of 'In Bruges'.

metas.name: American Psycho
metas.description: A dark satire with elements of horror and black comedy, appealing to fans of the dark humor of 'Seven Psychopaths'.

metas.name: Army of Darkness
metas.description: A horror comedy combining medieval fantasy with slapstick humor and gore, similar to horror-comedy such as Shaun of the Dead.

metas.name: They Live
metas.description: A Sci-Fi action film with a satirical message about consumerism, similar to action films such as Running Man.

metas.name: Repo Man
metas.description: A cult classic Sci-Fi punk-comedy with a zany plot, similar to odd comedy such as Ace Ventura.

metas.name: Heathers
metas.description: A dark teen comedy that satirizes high school hierarchies and social norms, similar to Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery.
